about_the_game:
It is the year 1890, London. As a carriage driver, you must be vigilant at every turn, as danger lurks from every direction.

REPAIR AND UPGRADE YOUR CARRIAGE.

In this challenging reality, besides driving, you will also have to repair your carriage, which is prone to damages and breakdowns. You will need technical skills and tools to maintain your work in this gloomy city.

TAKE CARE OF YOUR HORSE!

However, it's not just the carriage that is crucial. Taking care of your loyal horse is essential as it will accompany you on journeys through the streets of London. You must feed, water, and look after its health to provide the strength and endurance needed to overcome difficult routes.

TRANSPORT THE CLIENTS ALIVE!

Satisfying clients is also necessary as they are your only chance for earnings. You must ensure a safe journey through the dark alleys. Be courteous, attentive to their needs, and strive to provide satisfaction to earn good reviews and more orders. It will be a challenging task as not everyone will even survive.

Will you be able to meet these challenges and survive in the dark and dangerous London?

name: London Cab

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows(64-bit) 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows(64-bit) 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K / AMD Ryzen 7 1700X
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Imagine yourself as a 19th-century London carriage driver. You must be vigilant, as danger lurks at every corner. Darkness and challenging times make surviving in this world even until the next day difficult. You must be brave and make wise decisions to endure in this gloomy world full of perils.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Romanian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
